timecube.description: Four simultaneous days in one Earth rotation?
timecube.lore_1: Timecube theory posits that a day should be divided into four simultaneous 24-hour cycles, not one.
timecube.lore_2: It suggests that traditional timekeeping is a form of control, limiting human understanding of time's true nature.
timecube.lore_3: Using the power of cubic time is not without risk, as it can cause temporal anomalies and shattered timelines.

wetiko.description: A psychic virus or cultural metaphor?
wetiko.lore_1: Wetiko, from Cree mythology, is a spirit that causes greed, selfishness, and destruction, likened to a mind virus.
wetiko.lore_2: It suggests a non local force that when infecting something can corrupt and destroy it.
wetiko.lore_3: The cure to Wetiko is found in Wetiko itself, for evil will inevitable destory even itself.

the nephelim looked like clowns.description: Ancient giants with a bizarre appearance?
the nephelim looked like clowns.lore_1: This theory humorously or bizarrely suggests that the Nephilim, biblical giants, had clown-like features.
the nephelim looked like clowns.lore_2: The modern clown costume was created by the freemasons and is based on the design of ancient hindu demons.
the nephelim looked like clowns.lore_3: Those wearing the skin of the Nephilm run the risk of possion by the dispossesed spirits of anti-deluvian giants.

deep soy, xeno estrogens.description: Are we being feminized by chemicals?
deep soy, xeno estrogens.lore_1: Deep Soy and xeno estrogens relate to fears that environmental chemicals are altering human biology, specifically masculinity.
deep soy, xeno estrogens.lore_2: Testosterone levels in men have been declining since the 1940s, and this is often blamed on chemicals in the environment, AKA xeno estrogens.
deep soy, xeno estrogens.lore_3: Common items that contain xeno estrogens include plastics, some foods, and most disturbingly grocery store receipts.

eating food makes you age.description: Are we aging with every bite?
eating food makes you age.lore_1: This theory suggests that the act of eating, especially certain foods, accelerates aging due to metabolic processes.
eating food makes you age.lore_2: The theory is based on the idea that the body's metabolism is accelerated when we eat, spending more energy on digestions.
eating food makes you age.lore_3: The theory also points out that when the body is not digesting, it instead spends that energy on repair and maintenance.

wars are started on purpose for the sake.base: wars are started on purpose for the sake of profit
wars are started on purpose for the sake.lore_1: This theory states that wars are orchestrated by those who profit from them, like arms manufacturers or resource companies.
wars are started on purpose for the sake.lore_2: But not only that, the theory also suggests that the same entities that profit from the war shall profit from the re-building that follows.
wars are started on purpose for the sake.lore_3: Sell the world a gun, then sell them the bullets, then sell them the bandages, then sell them the peace.

microchips found in fossils.lore_1: A theory claims microchips or advanced technology have been found in fossilized remains.
microchips found in fossils.lore_2: Theories cite the stories of coal miners, finding fossilized microchips in coal that have remained burried for millenia.
microchips found in fossils.lore_3: These machines we're building. did we really design them ourselves?
